title: Definitions
context: ยง50-2 Definitions. Whenever used in this chapter, unless a different meaning clearly appears from the context: &ldquo;County&rdquo; or &ldquo;counties&rdquo; means the city and county of Honolulu and the counties of Hawaii, Kauai, and Maui. &ldquo;Legislative body of the county&rdquo; means the county council. [L 1963, c 73, pt of ยง2; Supp, ยง143A-2; HRS ยง50-2] Revision Note Definition of &ldquo;chairman of the county&rdquo; deleted as obsolete. Definition of &ldquo;legislative body of county&rdquo; revised by deleting references to board of supervisors and to city council of Honolulu.
